channel.title: [pi] Price error
channel.description: When i set a price to 0 amount, it says you need coins to buy these items. How do i fix where if an item is "0 coins" a player needs NO coins to buy this item.

item.title: [pi] Price error

item.description:
@santa_skillz wrote:

When i set a price to 0 amount, it says you need coins to buy these items. How do i fix where if an item is “0 coins” a player needs NO coins to buy this item.
